extraDescription: The Contractor will perform the work required to develop and provide Canada with the course materials required for the AMT Control Center for Operators training
comments: This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 100004575 dated August 31, 2015. The contract was not captured by our financial system and the issue has been corrected since then. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
